statements: DELETE FROM AR_VR_Analytics WHERE user_id = 123 AND event_type = 'interaction' AND event_time < '2021-08-01';

DELETE FROM Performance_Tracking WHERE performance_metric = 'load_time' AND performance_value < 0.5;
